snippet.title: Among Us is coming to Playstation! 🎮 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Among Us is coming to PS4™ and PS5™ consoles later this year, along with an exclusive Ratchet & Clank skin, hat, and pet just for PlayStation®. Featuring crossplay, online multiplayer, and plenty of emergency meetings.

✨ Get official Among Us merch: https://store.innersloth.com/​

Among Us is a game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-10 players...in space! Play online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone.

------------------------------------------

🚀  LINKS  🚀

➫ Website: http://innersloth.com/​
➫  YouTube: https://youtube.com/c/Innersloth​
➫ Twitter: https://twitter.com/InnerslothDevs​
➫ Among Us Twitter: https://twitter.com/AmongUsGame​
➫ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Innersloth/​
➫ Discord: discord.gg/innersloth
➫ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/innerslothd...​
➫ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@amongus​

------------------------------------------

🚀 GAMES 🚀

➥ Among Us (iOS, Android, itch.io, Steam, Nintendo Switch): http://innersloth.com/gameAmongUs.php​
➥ The Henry Stickmin Collection: http://innersloth.com/gameHenryCollec...​
➥ Dig 2 China: http://innersloth.com/gameDig2China.php​

-----------------------------------------

Trailer done by Derek Lieu: https://www.derek-lieu.com/
